module.p:
eaglaiseach ecclesiastical is a derived adjective, with stem eaglais
church and suffix -each.

section.p:
Examples from modern usage –
Ma tha laigead ri a chur às leth òrdachadh an fhoghlaim sin air fad, is e gun robh e ro cheangailte ri riaghladh eaglaiseach.
If there is any weakness to be found in this educational set-up, it is the fact that it was too closely tied to ecclesiastical control. td. 193
